name: Blob Simulator(CORRUPT UPDATE!)
description:
If on mobile or chromebook i recommend playing in browser.if on PC you can install the app and then read the download and install instructions.

CONTROLS: Arrow keys or WAD to move, K to change name, P for pixelate effect,C for corrupt affect

FOR MOBILE: Press the Purple buttons on the game screen. if your on mobile, fullscreen is recommended.

FOR PLAYING IN BROWSER: Fullscreen is recommended for better quality

Touch that ball falling from the sky.

The SOUNDTRACKS used in this game is Megalovania Shell Remix.
